        <message>```javascipt
var userName = 'username';
var userPassword = 'password';
var user = GlideUser;
var authed = user.authenticate(userName,userPassword);

gs.print(authed); //returns true or false (boolean)
```

**Source:** https://community.servicenow.com/community?id=community_question&sys_id=28b907e5db5cdbc01dcaf3231f961941</message>
